titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: OTHER GENE OR STRATIFICATION BIOMARKER TYPE ANALYSED COMMENT - Description

div.p: OTHER GENE OR STRATIFICATION BIOMARKER TYPE ANALYSED COMMENT is the same as attribute CLINICAL INTERVENTION TEXT STRING.

OTHER GENE OR STRATIFICATION BIOMARKER TYPE ANALYSED COMMENT is free text to specify the Gene or Stratification Biomarker that was analysed, where GENE OR STRATIFICATION BIOMARKER TYPE ANALYSED is National Code 'Other (not listed)'.
